pages.text: Once you activate your nether portal, you might notice a message at the bottom of your screen. If you read it, you know what's going on and how to stop it. Though, if you're unsure and can't remember: you must place 12 crying obsidian around the portal to stop the spread. Don't worry, though! It only spreads 30 blocks.$(br2)$(italics)$(strike)Or just break the portal, you goober.
